title: Software Engineer
description: Designs and builds computer programs and mobile apps. High demand in fintech and e-commerce.

title: Medical Doctor
description: Diagnoses and treats patients. Requires long study duration but offers high job security.

title: Accountant
description: Manages financial records and taxes. ACCA/CPA certification is highly valued.

title: Digital Marketer
description: Promotes brands online using social media, SEO, and ads. Very dynamic field.
pathway: Degree in Marketing / Mass Comm / Business

title: Civil Engineer
description: Designs infrastructure like roads, bridges, and buildings.

title: Data Scientist
description: Analyzes complex data to help companies make decisions. The 'sexiest job' of the 21st century.
pathway: Degree in Data Science / Statistics / CS
